Control Statement: The organization: a. Tests the contingency plan for the information system [Assignment: organization-defined frequency] using [Assignment: organization-defined tests] to determine the effectiveness of the plan and the organizational readiness to execute the plan;b. Reviews the contingency plan test results; andc. Initiates corrective actions, if needed.
